mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_proposal (prop_title, prop_content, prop_account, prop_ed_td, prop_tell, svc_idx, prop_id) VALUES (#{prop_title}, #{prop_content}, #{prop_account}, #{prop_ed_td}, #{prop_tell}, #{svc_idx}, #{prop_id});
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, s.svc_id, s.svc_categori FROM t_proposal p JOIN t_service s ON p.svc_idx = s.svc_idx WHERE p.prop_id = #{user_id}
SELECT p.*, s.svc_id, s.svc_categori FROM t_proposal p JOIN t_service s ON p.svc_idx = s.svc_idx WHERE (#{svc_idx} = -1 OR p.svc_idx = #{svc_idx}) AND s.svc_id = #{user_id};
